website_summaries.verdict: This kit includes not just one but four little gingerbread houses.
pros: A set of 4 adorable gingerbread houses ready to assemble
The kit comes with 4 kinds of candy and red and white icing
Each house comes with a sturdy base to build upon and it's easy for kids to put these small houses together
cons: May have trouble getting pieces to stick

customer_reviews.title: The only gingerbread kit worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Our group bought SIX gingerbread kits this year instead of building from scratch as we usually do with graham crackers and auntie's famous glue icing...we will NEVER do that again, because only ONE of the kits we bought (this one) arrived unbroken and held together upon building. All the others had broken pieces and could not be fully salvaged. This one had no broken pieces and plenty of icing and decorations. In this kit Wilton includes the most adorable candies shaped like Christmas lights that were the envy of all the other kids. All four little houses turned out exactly like their pictures - happily made by a six-year old with Mom helping to put the pieces together...
customer_reviews.author: northwest coast

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: These were so easy to build! I don’t have patience for stuff like this but needed 12 of them for my kids’ holiday get together with their friends. They were quick to put together and looked great. All the pieces were easy to break apart and fit together well. I just carefully scored them with a serrated knife before breaking them apart.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a fun craft for my 8 year old granddaughter. She was so excited to work on it. When we opened the package, the cookie pieces were so hard and unmanageable. They have lines baked into each house piece to break into side pieces. When I tried to help with the instruction for breaking apart, the pieces were so old and hard, they just crumbled. I think they were from last year. Terrible quality. Needless to say, we were both really disappointed. Don't waste your money. I thought for a Wilton product, they would be much better. Also, the icing was extremely messy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Lack

customer_reviews.title: Yep, broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Each of the buildings comes in one slab that you have to break apart into the different building components. All four buildings are wrapped together in plastic. Three of the four slabs are broken, won't know about the fourth until I open it up. Sad, hoping I can fix it. Because of the way they make the slab of pieces, because it's broken it's not just one wall of the house, but multiple.
customer_reviews.author: Elisia Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Holiday fun
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a steal for a mini village for my kids holiday party. I had 4 kids over and each were to get their own mini house to assemble. However it comes with no instructions nor are the pieces labeled. It was really hard for us to figure out what piece went to which house. Neverthe less if u want to wing it and just have fun then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: This box came with a nice variety of mini gingerbread houses, which was perfect to do as a Christmas project with my three grandchildren. They were each able to get their own to decorate instead of having all three decorate just one house. It was a fun project that we were all able to do together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The kit was affordable and fun to put together but most of the gingerbread was broken when I opened the box. Also, each piece should be separate, having to cut each side of the houses is difficult and can make the pieces crumble.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: These little villages were so much fun for the kids to decorate. We bought two packages and each kid got their own. My husband and I constructed the houses the day before, so all the kids had to do was decorate, we didn't want them to have to wait for the icing to harden before they could decorate. We purchased additional candies, but it came with a good variety. I also made additional icing. I don't know if anyone actually ate one, so I don't know how they taste, but the kids ate plenty of icing and candy during the decorations.
customer_reviews.author: LaniM

customer_reviews.title: Needs more supplies for the non professional
customer_reviews.text: I think that the average parent is like me. We are going for fun and not professional quality. My 5 year old enjoyed herself. We only made 2 out of 4 so far because there's clearly hardly any gumdrops, fondant, or frosting. We aren't pros so we needed more "glue" to let it dry overnight or else it would have never worked. I am going to buy more this week so we can finish next weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Ech

customer_reviews.title: Broken & hardened icing. Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: This set arrived earlier than expected. But two of the little houses were crushed or broken. And the icing and fondant were rock hard in their original packages. This set was a real disappointed me and especially my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: This was great and my grandson could be creative
customer_reviews.text: Most of these are assembled in minutes. My grandson and I spent hours creating these houses. The instructions were easy to follow and the frosting was easy to handle. The candies were delicious and easy to put on the houses.. This is a truly great activity to do with your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Saperstein

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fun activity for Christmas and the kit is not edible. If you look on the back of the box it says it uses an ingredient that is illegal in the state of California because it causes cancer. Overall, I was not satisfied with my purchase and the cookies were hard to break.
customer_reviews.author: Viv E

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY- OLD Supplies- terrible product
customer_reviews.text: All the icing was old and the gingerbread was so old it cracked. It was impossible to work with because the supplies were so old. We had to use actual glue to make it work and even then we could only build 2 of the 4 houses. They were very tiny and not at all like the pictures shown. Worst product I ever purchased on Amazon! I had to go buy store bought icing to make these doable. Waste of money- don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product many times but this time I was very disappointed when it arrived partially broken. I was able to assemble one house but the rest were ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Frith

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: This village was SO MUCH FUN to put together. The kids had a ball.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tindall

customer_reviews.title: GINGERBREAD HOUSE KIT
customer_reviews.text: MY GRAND DAUGHTER WHOSE 11, THOUGHT SHE SHOULD BUILD A GINGERBREAD HOUSE FOR XMAS. SO THIS WAS PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Aldinger

customer_reviews.title: Bigger sizes are better...
customer_reviews.text: These were far too small for the first timers to put together and enjoy decorating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always a challenge
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on flavor as we never eat them! But they were a fun family project!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N. Canaday

customer_reviews.title: Cute Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute set but one was broken in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Gallager

customer_reviews.title: Does
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst to put together and break apart. 10/10 would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Veruka

customer_reviews.title: Fun tradition
customer_reviews.text: Was not broken upon arrival. Easy to assemble. Addedy own “decorations” and made more frosting and it came out super cute. The only thing is you can find these cheaper at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Kit is old, cookies crumble when you try to cut them apart, not a single house was salvaged. The icing was so old it wouldn’t even stick to anything, the cookie, my finger, nada. The sprinkles were so old they were losing color - wish I could get my money back. Total waste of money for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Broken mini gingerbread houses
customer_reviews.text: Cookies broke trying to break along the seams. Seam groves not deep enough to snap apart without breaking cookie parts into pieces. Couldn’t make the mini gingerbread houses during our holiday gingerbread house decorating party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: This gingerbread house is very hard to assemble. The gingerbread is really thick and they make you cut up each piece so you up end up cracking the pieces in weird places and it gets really uneven when assembling. Then you overcompensate with tons of icing and it becomes a hot mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N.

customer_reviews.title: Use a serrated knife to saw, don’t try to break the pieces apart.
customer_reviews.text: The gingerbread was very thick and had to be “sawed”with a serrated knife. Unfortunately, it broke in several pieces. I was able to use freshly made Royal Icing (not the thin icing that comes with the kit) to “glue” it back together. The village did not look the one in the picture, but we had fun decorating it.
customer_reviews.author: J Ottinger

customer_reviews.title: Mission Impossible
customer_reviews.text: This was a hard tasteless gingerbread that was almost impossible not to break apart before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Sandoval Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Kid Crafts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids on Thanksgiving to look forward to Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi W

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kids to decorate at thanksgiving they had a good time i did break a few pieces when separating them to assemble
customer_reviews.author: keila

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was very hard to assemble and we ultimately didn’t get it together. It was supposed to be a special occasion so I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered in whole pieces. Lacks on candy variety but I enjoyed the red icing! Also treated really good, and I typically do not like eating gingerbread! In whole, it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Acrivos

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoyed building this, was easy to do
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to build and tasted good to eat later
customer_reviews.author: Krista R. St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This was OK, but too small for little hands. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Nash

customer_reviews.title: 😏
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, receive several broken pieces and very difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bettina B. Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Opened and it was in unsalvageable pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson on his birthday. He asked for a truck and a gingerbread house. He opened it and it was in pieces. Not even salvageable. Sad, this seems to be the case with most of these.
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: They houses are tiny and easy to break. Very hard to figure out and not worth it. They kept breaking and the box is very deceiving. It was such a hassle. Kids were very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Break when you cut them
customer_reviews.text: These are very tiny houses but the frustrating part was that the pieces needed to be cut. Most of the cuts I made caused the house to crumble so we had to use graham crackers instead with the frosting and decorations from the box.
customer_reviews.author: mocoug

customer_reviews.title: Actual size
customer_reviews.text: Liked it and used it for a contest, which I came in first place
customer_reviews.author: dimples713

customer_reviews.title: Gingerbread House
customer_reviews.text: So much fun with a bunch of adults! I pre made the 1st step the day before. It takes a long time for structure to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Woodrum

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. They are impossible to break apart without breaking all of the sides in the process. Every piece cracked and crumbled and I had to throw everything away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Opened this today and there are lots of broken cookie parts so instead of building a gingerbread house, we just made them into Gingerbread cookies. Lots of decorations so I think the house would have been very cute if we could have set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My gingerbread house turned out great but we only ended up making two of the four because we ran out of frosting and candy
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dergance

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to assemble without breaking the cookies. From 4 houses i managed to assemble only two
customer_reviews.author: anna panagiotopoulou

customer_reviews.title: Family fun.
customer_reviews.text: I did this my 2 year old granddaughters. The royal icing did not come out easily and I did knead it as the instructions stated. I thought the size of the houses were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute little houses
customer_reviews.text: Once you get them apart it’s doing easy to do. They look super cute and it was fun to do!
customer_reviews.author: mikaela

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: This was horrible. One came damaged and then as we tried to build the other 3 they all broke!! What a waste of money and I’m so disappointed as are the kids!
customer_reviews.author: W.Fum

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Houses very very small, would have not bought looked way bigger in pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The leaves were missing. Instead there were two bags of huge candy corn, which were too heavy for cookie and didn't stay on. Cute but very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: mary kaye

customer_reviews.title: Great kit but a few were broken
customer_reviews.text: We loved this kit but a few were broken. However it's pretty easy to fix the broken pieces using the icing given as glue :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: The gingerbread broke when cutting. Not a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced pieces of crap
customer_reviews.text: Complete trash, not worth the aggravation or over price cost. 2 of the 4 houses had broken pieces rendering them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The gingerbread was very dry and broke easily. Not really enough supplies for all houses
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Janezich

customer_reviews.title: Fun to do at Xmas parties! Must have for holidays with Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these little gingerbread village! So much fun to put together kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: maria marrero

customer_reviews.title: Broken!!! :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family gingerbread bake off today we open the packaging and it's broken... So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Ward

customer_reviews.title: ALL BROKEN :(
customer_reviews.text: Received the package and every single piece was crushed! I'm so sad
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lucido

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble and bought two boxes even though other reviews mentioned the cookies came broken. Both boxes were intact and were easy to break into their individual pieces. Each box came with 2 bags of icing, 1 bag of fondant, and other candies for decoration. I'm pretty satisfied and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Irieri

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Christmas village and I received something different. I ordered this item specifically because it had four different buildings and the family it was going to had eight children (so two children could build each house). I’m very disappointed that what was sent (1) wasn’t enough for all of them to build and (2) didn’t even cost as much as the one I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G.

customer_reviews.title: Really, really, really hard to do!
customer_reviews.text: Lots were broken. Really tiny, challenging to put together, challenging to keep together! All around challenging. At least we laughed really hard. Won’t buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: KDS

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Village
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about breaking all the bits, as they come in sheets and are partially scored. The assembly wasn't difficult, but they didn't natay together well. Parts shifted a bit before drying
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our 6 and 3 year olds to decorate without taking forever to decorate or taking up a bunch of space. One house did arrive broken. The gingerbread is yummy too
customer_reviews.author: C. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: you forgot to include white frosting!!
customer_reviews.text: none of the pieces of the houses were marked. you forgot the white frosting. way too complicated for kids and an old grandma!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Canterbury

customer_reviews.title: FUN houses!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. One house was perfect, one had 1 broken wall. I called customer service, got a discount on broken one. The 1 broken wall was no big deal.....We had a blast making ginger bread houses!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun with my grandchildren putting together. Highly recommend so much fun. I will be ordering again sometime soon. Very nice everything was in the box
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the houses were broken when we opened the box. Not a lot of candy for decorating.
customer_reviews.author: Dana R.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They were so teeny tiny and nothing stuck together. And theiquid candy you needed to soften to get out to connect the pieces was aoooo tough and messy.
customer_reviews.author: LMarii

customer_reviews.title: Hard to break apart
customer_reviews.text: Don’t do this to yourself. The pieces are hard to break apart and look funny once put together.
customer_reviews.author: Danny V

customer_reviews.title: Snow Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great fun activity for my young adult kids!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. They’re too small to actually work on.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Nutt

customer_reviews.title: That this is fragile, and should be handled with care.
customer_reviews.text: I got it broken, this is frustrating. I'll keep it because I do not have time to change or do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Morgana Moisés

product_meta.title: Wilton Build it Yourself Mini Village Gingerbread Decorating Kit
product_meta.description: Looking for a great family activity for the holidays? We've got the perfect decorating kit for your gathering, you just need to provide the hot cocoa and holiday music for everyone to enjoy while you create! This kit has 4 mini houses and everything you need for everyone to build and decorate their own. Use the box for inspiration or give it your own touch. Includes 3 types of candy; Green fondant, Red and white ready-to-use icing; 2 decorating bags and tips and instruction sheet.
feature_bullets: Get the family together for gingerbread an afternoon or night of gingerbread-decorating fun
Ready to assemble with everything you need to build and decorate 4 houses
Includes 4 sets of gingerbread house panels, 3 types of candy, green fondant, red and white ready-to-use icing, 2 decorating bags and tips and instruction sheet
Contains wheat; made on equipment that also processes egg, milk, soy and tree nuts
Assembled houses measure between 3.25 and 4 in. high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars268 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
